welcome.title: Welcome to Seline
welcome.subtitle: Your AI-powered creative companion. Let's get you set up in just a few steps.

agents.title: Custom AI Agents
agents.desc: Create specialized assistants with unique personalities and capabilities

tools.title: Powerful Tools
tools.desc: Generate images, search the web, analyze code, and more

memory.title: Persistent Memory
memory.desc: Your agents remember preferences and learn your workflow

provider.title: Choose Your AI Provider

anthropic.title: Anthropic
anthropic.desc: Use your own Claude API key for direct access

codex.title: OpenAI Codex (ChatGPT Plus)
codex.desc: Use your ChatGPT Plus/Pro subscription for GPT-4o and o1

claudecode.title: Claude Code (Pro / MAX)
claudecode.desc: Use your Claude Pro or MAX subscription for Opus 4.6, Sonnet 4.5, and Haiku 4.5

kimi.title: Moonshot Kimi
kimi.desc: Use Moonshot's Kimi K2.5 with 256K context and vision

embedding.title: Enable Vector Search

complete.title: You're All Set!

tips.agent: Create your first AI agent with custom personality

webSearch.title: Enable Web Search
webSearch.subtitle: Web search works out of the box with DuckDuckGo (free). Add a Tavily API key for richer results and Deep Research.

deepResearch.title: Deep Research
deepResearch.desc: Comprehensive web research with multi-source synthesis

realtime.title: Real-time Information
realtime.desc: Access current events, news, and up-to-date information

factVerification.title: Fact Verification
factVerification.desc: Verify claims and cross-reference information from multiple sources

webSearch.step1: Sign up at tavily.com (free tier available)
webSearch.step2: Copy your API key from the dashboard
webSearch.step3: Paste it above and click "Test API Key"

webScraping.title: Web Scraping Provider
webScraping.subtitle: Choose how your agents will browse and extract content from web pages
webScraping.localDesc: Built-in web scraping using Puppeteer. No API key required, runs on your machine.
webScraping.firecrawlDesc: Professional cloud-based scraping with advanced features and reliability.
webScraping.step2: Copy your API key from the dashboard
webScraping.step3: Paste it above and click "Test API Key"

step1.title: Workspaces let your agent work in isolation
step1.description: Your agent can create a separate copy of your code using git worktrees, make changes, and submit them for review — without touching your working files.
step1.hint: This badge appears in your chat header when a workspace is active.

step2.title: Review changes before they land
step2.description: See exactly what changed in a side panel with syntax-highlighted diffs. Approve changes, sync them to your local repository, or ask the agent to revise.
step2.hint: Click "View Changes" from the workspace badge to open the diff panel.

step3.title: Track all workspaces at a glance
step3.description: See all your agents' active workspaces on the home page — their status, branch names, PR links, and quick actions like continue, cleanup, or view PR.
step3.hint: Active workspaces appear above your agent cards on the home page.

indicator.cleanupDescription: This will remove the git worktree for branch {branch} and discard any uncommitted changes. This action cannot be undone.

folderSync.noFoldersDescription: Add synced folders so this agent can use file tools and optional vector search
folderSync.folderPathTip: Tip: Copy the folder path from Finder (Cmd+Option+C) or Terminal
folderSync.largeFilesWillBeSkipped: large file(s) over {maxLines} lines will be skipped
folderSync.verifyLater: You can still add this folder - it will be verified when syncing.
folderSync.clickAddReminder: Click "Add Folder" to save this folder to the index
folderSync.reindexConfirm: This will rebuild the index for all folders and may take a while. Continue?
folderSync.reindexHint: Use after enabling V2 to rebuild lexical vectors.
folderSync.advancedModeHint: Fine-tune trigger sources, schedule checks, filters, chunking, and full re-scan policy.
folderSync.cadenceValidation: Check interval must be at least 5 minutes.
folderSync.chunkOverlapValidation: Chunk overlap must be >= 0 and smaller than chunk size.
folderSync.chunkSizeValidation: Chunk size must be at least 100 characters.
folderSync.lastRunReasonInitial: Initial baseline sync after adding folder
folderSync.lastRunReasonScheduledFull: Scheduled check ran a full re-scan
folderSync.maxFileSizeValidation: Largest file size must be between 1 MB and 512 MB.
folderSync.reindexSmartDescription: Runs a full re-scan at most once every 24 hours during scheduled checks.
folderSync.simpleModeHint: Recommended defaults: update on file changes, balanced chunking, no automatic full re-scan.
folderSync.simpleModeBehavior: Simple mode: changes in this folder are synced automatically; no periodic full-folder re-scan.
folderSync.behaviorHybrid: Syncs on file changes and on schedule
folderSync.autoModeWarning: Auto mode combines file-change and scheduled sync. Use with care for large folders.
folderSync.transparencyHint: Tip: Expand a folder to see what triggered the last sync and whether it was a full re-scan.
folderSync.sharedFromWorkflow: This folder is shared from a workflow

intro.subtitle: Configure a focused AI agent for your work or projects
intro.quickPrompt: Describe your agent's role or purpose in one sentence:
intro.quickPlaceholder: Customer support agent for our SaaS product that answers FAQs and drafts replies.

name.question: What shall we call your agent?
name.label: Enter agent name:
name.errorMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
name.errorMaxLength: Name must be less than 50 characters

concept.question: Describe your agent's role, domain, and personality...
concept.label: Agent concept (role, domain, and how it should help you):
concept.placeholder: e.g., A wise mentor who guides heroes on their journey...
concept.example1: Customer support agent that answers FAQs and drafts email replies
concept.example2: Product research assistant that summarizes user interviews and feature requests
concept.example3: Technical writing agent that explains APIs in clear, simple language
concept.errorMinLength: Please describe your agent in at least 10 characters
concept.errorMaxLength: Concept must be less than 500 characters

identity.question: Define your agent's identity and purpose...
identity.purposePlaceholder: Describe what this agent does, its domain expertise, and how it should help users...
identity.errorNameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
identity.errorNameMax: Name must be less than 50 characters
identity.errorTaglineMax: Tagline must be less than 100 characters
identity.errorPurposeMin: Please describe the agent's purpose in at least 10 characters
identity.errorPurposeMax: Purpose must be less than 1000 characters

embeddingSetup.question: Choose an embedding provider and model.

openrouter.title: OpenRouter (Cloud)
openrouter.description: Use OpenRouter embeddings with your API key.

local.title: Local (On-device)
local.description: Run embeddings locally with bundled models.

mcpTools.title: MCP Tools
mcpTools.description: Select which MCP servers and tools to enable for this agent.
mcpTools.noServersDescription: Configure MCP servers in Settings → MCP Servers to enable external tools.
mcpTools.serversNotConnected: MCP servers are configured but not connected. Connect to discover available tools.

loadingMode.label: Loading Mode
loadingMode.alwaysTooltip: Tool loads immediately with every request (uses more tokens)
loadingMode.deferredTooltip: Tool is discovered on-demand via searchTools (saves tokens)

style.question: Choose a visual style for your agent...

knowledgeBase.question: Upload documents to build the agent's knowledge base...
knowledgeBase.skipHint: You can skip this step and add documents later

success.title: {name} is Ready!
success.subtitle: Your agent has been created successfully.

avatarEdit.promptHint: Edit the prompt and regenerate to customize the avatar

errors.invalidFormat: Please upload a PNG, JPEG, or WebP image

errors.forbidden: You don't have access to this resource
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.genericRefresh: Something went wrong. Please refresh the page.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage how Seline works for you

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.description: Run setup again if you want to update your initial choices

memoryDefaults.title: Default memory for new agents
memoryDefaults.description: Add preferences that should be included automatically when new agents are created.
memoryDefaults.placeholder: e.g. Keep answers short and practical
memoryDefaults.empty: No default memory yet. Add one to personalize future agents.

errors.popupBlocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups for this site and try again.

api.title: Choose your AI provider
api.description: Choose where your assistant models run, then add only the keys you need.

auth.pasteInstructions: A browser tab has been opened. After authorizing, copy the code shown on the page and paste it below.
auth.antigravityDesc: Use your Antigravity subscription to access supported premium models.
auth.codexDesc: Connect your OpenAI account to use Codex models.
auth.claudecodeDesc: Connect your Anthropic account to use Claude Code models.

openrouter.label: OpenRouter API Key
openrouter.helper: Use OpenRouter models and cloud embeddings.

kimi.label: Moonshot API Key
kimi.helper: Create a key in your Moonshot account.

webSearchProvider.label: Web search source
webSearchProvider.helper: Auto uses Tavily when a key is saved, otherwise falls back to DuckDuckGo.

tavily.label: Tavily API Key
tavily.helper: Needed only for Tavily and Deep Research advanced mode.

webScraperProvider.label: Web page reader
webScraperProvider.helper: Use the built-in local reader or Firecrawl cloud API.

firecrawl.label: Firecrawl API Key
firecrawl.helper: Needed only if you choose Firecrawl.

seline.label: Seline media key
seline.helper: Needed for image and video generation.

ollama.label: Ollama URL
ollama.helper: Use the URL of your local Ollama OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

openai.label: OpenAI API Key
openai.helper: Needed for OpenAI speech-to-text and text-to-speech.

mcp.disabledTooltip: This server is disabled and will not connect. Toggle to enable.
mcp.filesystemRequiresSyncedFolder: Filesystem MCP server requires at least one synced folder. Please add a folder in Settings → Synced Folders.
mcp.variableHelp: Use ${SYNCED_FOLDER} for single-folder access or ${SYNCED_FOLDERS_ARRAY} for multi-folder access
mcp.envVarsAdded: Added {count} environment variable(s). Fill in the values below.
mcp.validationCommandRequired: Command is required for stdio transport
mcp.validationUrlRequired: URL is required for SSE transport
mcp.noServersYet: No servers added yet. Add one to get started.
mcp.noEnvVarsSet: No environment variables set. Add them in the Environment Variables section below.
mcp.headersHint: Headers are sent with every SSE request. Use ${VAR_NAME} for environment variables. Common: Authorization, X-API-Key, X-Project-ID.

filesystem.name: Files (single folder)
filesystem.description: Read and write files in one synced folder

chrome-devtools.name: Chrome DevTools
chrome-devtools.description: Inspect and debug pages in Chrome

composio.name: Composio
composio.setup: Get Connection ID from Composio. For Tool Router, replace URL with: https://backend.composio.dev/tool_router/'{router_id}'/mcp

supabase.name: Supabase
supabase.description: Manage Supabase project data and APIs

everything.name: Everything
everything.description: Sample server with many example tools

models.title: Model choices
models.subtitle: Choose which model to use for each task. Leave blank to use provider defaults.

defaults.label: Defaults:
defaults.value: If left empty, Seline chooses sensible defaults for your selected provider.

research.label: Research Model
research.helper: Used when Deep Research is enabled.

vision.label: Image understanding model
vision.helper: Used for analyzing images and screenshots.

utility.label: Background task model
utility.helper: Used for quick helper tasks behind the scenes.

embeddingProvider.label: Embedding source
embeddingProvider.helper: Choose cloud embeddings or run them locally on this device.

embedding.label: Embedding Model
embedding.helper: Turns your files into searchable vectors.
embedding.helperLocal: Pick a local embedding model. It will download on first use.

embeddingLocalPath.label: Local Model Path
embeddingLocalPath.helper: Directory containing model folders (e.g., C:\models with Xenova/bge-large-en-v1.5 inside). Leave empty to allow cached downloads.

openrouterArgs.label: OpenRouter extra options (JSON)
openrouterArgs.helper: Optional advanced settings passed directly to OpenRouter.

tip.title: Tip:
tip.body: Use a faster model for background tasks and a stronger model for research-heavy work.

vector.title: Search your synced files
vector.subtitle: Turn on semantic file search so your agents can find relevant content in synced folders. Search data stays local in LanceDB.
vector.enabled: Vector search is on. You can choose indexed folders per agent in agent settings.

reindexRequired.title: Reindex needed.
reindexRequired.body: Embedding settings changed. Reindex synced folders to rebuild search data.
reindexRequired.folderHint: If search results look incomplete or outdated, open each agent's Synced Folders and run a folder refresh.

v2.title: V2 Features
v2.subtitle: Enable hybrid search, token chunking, and tuning for improved retrieval quality.
v2.maxFileLinesHelper: Files exceeding this line count will be skipped during indexing (default: 3000)
v2.maxLineLengthHelper: Files containing any line exceeding this character count will be skipped (checks for base64/massive strings, default: 1000)

advanced.title: Advanced Vector Settings
advanced.description: Fine-tune retrieval behavior, chunking, reranking, and file limits.

hybridSearch.title: Hybrid Search
hybridSearch.description: Combine dense and lexical search for better recall.

chunking.title: Token Chunking
chunking.description: Split documents into token-aware chunks for better retrieval.

reranking.title: Reranking
reranking.description: Rerank top results with an ONNX model for higher precision.
reranking.customModelHelper: Pick a preset or enter any Hugging Face cross-encoder reranker model ID.
reranking.wrongModelType: Wrong model type: This appears to be an embedding model, not a cross-encoder reranker. Rerankers score (query, text) pairs — they don’t produce vectors. Select a cross-encoder model like "cross-encoder/ms-marco-MiniLM-L-6-v2".
reranking.unrecognizedModel: Unrecognized model: Ensure this is a cross-encoder model (not an embedding model). Cross-encoders output relevance scores, not vectors.
reranking.downloadApiUnavailable: Model download API not available. Please restart the app.

fileLimits.title: File Limits
fileLimits.description: Skip files that are too large or contain extreme lines.
fileLimits.maxLinesHelper: Files exceeding this line count will be skipped during indexing (default: 3000)
fileLimits.maxLineLengthHelper: Files with any line exceeding this character count will be skipped (default: 1000)

preferences.title: App preferences
preferences.description: Personalize appearance, language, and how background checks run.

toolLoading.label: How tools are loaded
toolLoading.deferredHelper: Uses fewer tokens by loading tools only when needed.
toolLoading.alwaysHelper: Makes every tool immediately available, but each request uses more tokens.

postEditHooks.heading: After-edit checks
postEditHooks.description: Choose which checks run automatically after AI changes.
postEditHooks.fastDesc: Run typecheck only, and only for related areas.
postEditHooks.strictDesc: Run typecheck and lint across the full project.
postEditHooks.typecheckScopeDesc: Pick how widely typecheck should run after edits.

promptCaching.heading: Prompt caching
promptCaching.description: Reuse repeated prompt content to lower token usage and cost.
promptCaching.enableDesc: Helpful for longer conversations with repeated context.

rtk.heading: RTK (experimental)
rtk.description: Compacts command output to save tokens on supported tools.
rtk.enableDesc: Works only when RTK is installed and the command supports it.

devWorkspace.heading: Developer workspace
devWorkspace.description: Show workspace indicators, diff views, and tools for git-based coding workflows.
devWorkspace.enableDesc: Adds branch info, diff review panels, and a workspace dashboard.
devWorkspace.autoCleanDesc: Remove old worktrees automatically after merge or after a set number of days.
devWorkspace.recommendedServersDesc: Install {worktreeTools} for worktree management or {githubMcp} for pull request workflows. Configure them in Tool servers (MCP).

voice.heading: Voice & Audio
voice.description: Set up spoken replies and audio transcription with clear, friendly defaults.

tts.title: Text-to-Speech (TTS)
tts.description: Let the assistant speak replies in a way that matches how you chat.
tts.enableDesc: When enabled, the assistant can send voice output for replies.
tts.disabledHint: Turn this on to choose when voice is generated and which provider to use.
tts.whenDesc: Pick how often audio should be added to assistant replies.
tts.modeOffDesc: Audio is created only when you ask for it.
tts.modeChannelsDesc: Voice notes are added automatically in channels.
tts.modeAlwaysDesc: Every assistant reply includes audio output.
tts.providerDesc: Choose the service that generates spoken audio.
tts.providerEdgeDesc: Built-in Microsoft voices. No API key needed.
tts.providerOpenAIDesc: Uses your OpenAI or OpenRouter API key.
tts.providerElevenLabsDesc: Natural premium voices and voice cloning.
tts.defaultVoiceHelper: Used when a request does not specify a different voice.
tts.elevenLabsDesc: Add your key and voice so replies use the right ElevenLabs profile.
tts.voiceIdHelper: You can copy this from the ElevenLabs voice library.
tts.limitHelper: Messages above this limit are shortened before audio is generated.

stt.title: Speech-to-Text (STT)
stt.description: Convert incoming voice notes into text so they are easier to read and search.
stt.enableDesc: Automatically transcribe audio attachments from channels and voice-note apps.
stt.disabledHint: Turn this on to pick a provider and configure local Whisper model options.
stt.providerOpenAIDesc: Cloud transcription using your OpenAI or OpenRouter API key.
stt.providerLocalDesc: Runs on this device. No external API key needed.
stt.whisperSetupHint: Download a model above — whisper-cli and ffmpeg are bundled with the app. Transcription runs entirely on your device — no API key or internet needed.

localGrep.heading: Local grep search
localGrep.description: Configure fast text search in synced folders.

localImage.heading: Local image generation
localImage.description: Run image generation on this device using local backends.
localImage.hfTokenDesc: Needed to download gated models such as FLUX.2 Klein.
localImage.workflowsDesc: Paste or upload a workflow JSON file, then review inputs and outputs before saving.

modelBag.title: Model Bag

sessionOverride.helpText: Empty = use global setting. Enter a model ID to override for this session only.

tooltip.notConfigured: Provider not configured — set API key or connect in Settings

modelBag.footerHint: Click to switch model · Manage providers in <settings>Settings</settings>

workflows.createWorkflowDescription: Configure external instances and define new custom workflows.

metadata.heading: Workflow Metadata
metadata.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe what this workflow does...

definition.heading: Workflow Definition
definition.description: Paste ComfyUI JSON or upload a file.
definition.placeholder: Paste ComfyUI API JSON here (exported with Save (API Format)).

inputs.heading: Inputs Configuration
inputs.description: Map incoming data to workflow nodes.

localModels.title: Local Image Generation
localModels.webOnlyNote: Local image generation models are only available in the desktop app.
localModels.ipcNotImplemented: Backend IPC handlers not yet implemented. The Electron main process needs to handle {apiKey} operations.

installer.title: Local Image Generation (Z-Image Turbo FP8)
installer.description: Generate images locally using ComfyUI with the Z-Image Turbo FP8 model. Requires Docker and an NVIDIA GPU with ~12GB VRAM.
installer.webOnlyNote: Local ComfyUI backend is only available in the desktop app.
installer.enableDesc: Use local ComfyUI instead of cloud APIs
installer.dockerRequired: Docker is required. Please install Docker Desktop first.
installer.setupStep1: Build Docker images (~10-20 min first time)
installer.backendPathDesc: Override the default location for ComfyUI backend files and models.

vectorSearch.indexMismatch: Search index mismatch detected. If results seem off, refresh synced folders in Agent Settings.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Credits, support, and links
about.headline: Released and developed with the support of Styly
about.byline: Created and maintained by Umut Tan

empty.description: We couldn't load this agent chat. The agent may not exist or you may not have access.

sidebar.emptyHint: Create a new chat or adjust filters to see conversations.

channelSession.deleteDescription: This chat is linked to a channel. Deleting it will hide future messages in the app. You can archive and reset to start a fresh session while keeping the channel connected.

scheduledRun.description: Follow the run live or stop it if you need to interrupt the agent.

backgroundRun.zombieHint: This run looks stuck. You can force stop it.

chat.processingInBackgroundHint: Your response will appear automatically when ready

blocked.title: Context window limit exceeded
blocked.message: The conversation is too long for the current model's context window.
blocked.compactFailed: Automatic compaction could not free enough space.

channels.title: Channel inbox for {name}
channels.description: Connect external messaging channels so this agent can respond across your inboxes.
channels.securityNote: Credentials stay on this device and are only used to authenticate the channel connection.
channels.confirmDelete: Remove this channel connection? This will disconnect the agent from the channel.

form.createDescription: Choose a channel and provide the required credentials.
form.editDescription: Adjust connection details or replace credentials.
form.keepExisting: Leave blank to keep existing credentials.

whatsapp.connectHint: WhatsApp uses QR login. Connect, then scan the QR code with the WhatsApp mobile app.
whatsapp.selfChat: Allow self-chat (Message yourself from the linked phone).
whatsapp.qrHelp: Open WhatsApp on your phone, go to Linked Devices, and scan this code.

notices.slackScopesHint: Slack app needs these bot scopes for full functionality: messages:read, messages:write, channels:read, files:read. Check your app at api.slack.com if images aren't coming through.

usage.title: Usage & Analytics
usage.subtitle: Track token usage, tool calls, and media generation for your chat sessions.

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.empty: No sessions yet. Start a chat to see usage analytics.
sessions.select: Select a session on the left to see detailed usage and analytics.

tools.title: Tools
tools.empty: No tools were used in this session.

media.title: Media generation
media.empty: No images or videos were generated in this session.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your AI workspace at a glance
dashboard.pinCta: Pin important chats via ··· → Pin chat
dashboard.noChats: No chats yet. Start a conversation!

form.title: Add Memory
form.placeholder: e.g., User prefers 16:9 aspect ratio for all video content
form.hint: Be specific and actionable. This will be injected into the agent's system prompt.

empty.title: No memories yet
empty.pending: No pending memories to review. Memories are automatically extracted from conversations.
empty.approved: No approved memories. Approve pending memories or add them manually.
empty.all: Memories are automatically extracted from conversations. You can also add them manually.

errors.forbidden: You don't have access to this agent

visual_preferences.label: Visual Preferences
visual_preferences.description: Colors, styles, aesthetics, aspect ratios, design preferences

communication_style.label: Communication Style
communication_style.description: Tone, formality, language preferences, response format

workflow_patterns.label: Workflow Patterns
workflow_patterns.description: User habits, iteration patterns, tool sequences

observability.title: Observability Dashboard
observability.subtitle: Monitor agent runs, tool executions, and performance metrics

runs.pageSubtitle: View and inspect agent run history

prompts.title: Prompt Templates
prompts.subtitle: View and compare prompt version performance

skills.title: Skills
skills.emptyDescription: Save a workflow as a skill from chat, then run or schedule it here.

delete.description: This will permanently delete this skill. This action cannot be undone.
delete.title: Are you sure?

files.noFiles: No files found. This skill doesn't have any attached files.

new.title: Create Skill
new.descriptionPlaceholder: Summarize weekly competitor changes with concise bullets.
new.promptPlaceholder: Analyze the last 7 days and provide 5 bullets max.
new.triggerPlaceholder: What changed with our competitors this week?

import.browseHint: or click to browse (.zip packages or .md files)
import.importedDesc: {name} with {count, plural, one {# script} other {# scripts}}
import.invalidFileTypeDesc: Only .zip packages or .md files are supported

library.title: Cross-Agent Skill Library
library.noMatch: No skills matched your current filters.

schedules.title: Scheduled Tasks
schedules.description: Automate {name} to run tasks on a schedule
schedules.pageDescription: Automate {name} to run tasks on a defined schedule. Monitor execution history and manage active workflows.
schedules.deleteConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete this scheduled task and all its run history. This action cannot be undone.

empty.title: No scheduled tasks yet
empty.description: Create a schedule to automate your agent

form.name: Name
form.timezoneLocalNote: Task will run at this time in your current timezone
form.timezoneExplicitNote: Task will always run in {timezone}, regardless of your location
form.timezoneChanged: Your timezone has changed from {oldTimezone} to {newTimezone}. Update this schedule?
form.promptPlaceholder: What should the agent do when this schedule runs?
form.promptHint: This prompt will be sent to the agent when the schedule triggers

newForm.subtitle: Configure automation triggers and AI instructions.
newForm.unsavedChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes in this schedule. Are you sure you want to discard them and leave?

delivery.label: Delivery
delivery.hint: Send results to a connected channel or keep them in the app.

placeholders.name: Daily Content Digest
placeholders.description: Briefly describe the purpose of this task...
placeholders.prompt:
# Weekly Progress Digest
Generate a summary covering '{'LAST_7_DAYS'}'.

## Sections Required:
1. Key Accomplishments
   - List completed tasks
   - Highlight high-priority items
2. Metrics Analysis
   - Compare vs previous week
   - Identify blockers
3. Next Steps
   - Generate 3 action items for Monday

variables.label: Variables
variables.helpDescription: Variables are replaced with actual values when your schedule runs.

validation.deliveryTargetRequired: Select a channel target for delivery

readable.monthlyAt: Runs on day {day} of each month at {hour}:00

presets.title: Quick Start Templates
presets.subtitle: Choose a template to get started quickly

help.explanation: Presets are pre-configured schedule templates designed for common workflows. They include optimized timing, prompts, and settings.

bulk.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {count} schedules?

notifications.taskStaleDescription: {taskName} was automatically stopped after {duration} of inactivity
notifications.taskCreditExhaustedDescription: Please add credits to continue using AI features

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.subtitle: Extend your agent with skills, hooks, MCP servers, and more.
plugins.description: Add new capabilities to your agent with installable plugins.
plugins.confirmInstallDesc: Choose the main agent for this plugin. Imported sub-agents, tools, and shared folders will be linked to that workflow.
plugins.filesSelected: {count, plural, one {# file selected} other {# files selected}}
plugins.uninstallConfirm: Uninstall plugin "{name}"? This cannot be undone.
plugins.noPluginsHint: Upload a plugin .zip package to get started
plugins.requireAgentFirst: Create at least one agent before installing plugins with agent workflows.
plugins.selectAgentFirst: Select a main agent before continuing.
plugins.workspaceRegisteredDesc: Reference files are now accessible to the agent via its sync folder.

components.hookEvents: {count, plural, one {# hook event} other {# hook events}}
components.mcpServers: {count, plural, one {# MCP server} other {# MCP servers}}
components.agentRecordsCreated: {count, plural, one {# agent record created} other {# agent records created}}
components.referenceFiles: {count, plural, one {# reference file linked} other {# reference files linked}}

plugins.noPluginsYetHint: Upload a plugin package or install one from the marketplace
plugins.author: Author

marketplace.title: Plugin Marketplace
marketplace.noSourcesHint: Add a marketplace source to browse available plugins
marketplace.installGuidance: To install "{name}", download the .zip from the source and upload it via the Install Plugin button.

chatBadge.active: {count, plural, one {# plugin active} other {# plugins active}}
